EmailTemplate.name: 17.CEM.CXS.none.L.G.E.2450.Email 1 - Bell Labs white paper and webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Unlock the possibilities of proactive customer care
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Ready to Enable Predictive Customer Care? Bell Labs revolutionizes customer experience Customer care solutions can now predict home network problems using self- and machine-learning algorithms. Bell Labs’ research demonstrates how machine intelligence is evolving customer care from simple analytics to insights that predict what’s to come.
Choose from our white paper Using Algorithms for Advanced Customer Care or register for the Deliver Proactive Care for the Broadband Home Experience Using Analytics webinar to discover how to take customer care to the next level. Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
